column2: SELECT TOP # specObjID, survey, bestobjid, z /*Table of top # objects with redshift, survey they are in, and object ID for searching*/  FROM SpecObj /*Objects with spectra*/ WHERE class = &&& /* The objects shown will all be QSO&&&sdss&&&boss') /*searching across both the legacy and boss surveys (and not other surveys) */ order by newid() /* This is the randomisation algorithm */
